title: Oh you're climbing? Here, let me make your win rate 50% -Matchmaking
body:
Since your overall win rate should be 50%, just let me give you the next streak in favour of your opponent. I hope you have fun consistently getting a 0-6 bot lane by 6 minutes and a 1-18 botlane by 18 minutes. Just to make sure your win rate normalize I'll even throw in a 0-9 yasuo main for you. Make sure you buy more RP when you're finished the game to support my algorithm ;)

-Sincerely matchmaking

replies.body:
Ah yes I hate the riot matchmaking conspiracy. They recently also turned my pet frog gay. 

When riot says they try to get you to have a 50% winrate, they mean that if you go on a win streak your MMR will rise extremely quickly, and you will get to your deserved rank quickly, where you will have around a 50% winrate in.

I screwed up my own MMR a month ago. I was plat 3 and got bored with my main so I played other roles (not great I might add), and well I was dropped to plat 5 with 0 LP. I was winning 12 LP per win and losing 20+ per loss lol. I had a 54% wr and dropped to below 50%. Now I am back in plat 3 after some hard work, but I will never do that again that is for sure.
I get a win streak and get to s1, then lose about 7-10 games in a row, then climb back to s1, then lose 7-10 more games in a row. Rinse and repeat.
Pretty much true. I have 60% winrate, I get full team with 40% winrate max to 45%, enemy has 55%, 60%, 45%, 50% this is so lame.
